Words: I have had my invitation to this world's festival, and thus my life has been blessed.
Author: Rabindranath Tagore

Words: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
Author: Oscar Wilde

Words: The world isn’t perfect. But it’s there for us, doing the best it can….that’s what makes it so damn beautiful.
Author: Roy Mustang

Words: How can you move forward when you keep regretting the past?
I’m not stupid. I’m just too lazy to show how smart I am.
Author: Oreki Houtarou

Words: Knowing what it feels to be in pain, is exactly why we try to be kind to others.
Author: Jiraiya

Words: Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
Author: George Bernard Shaw

Words: Logic will get you from A to Z; imagination will get you everywhere.
Author: Albert Einstein

Words: One good thing about music, when it hits you, you feel no pain.
Author: Bob Marley

Words: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
Author: Winston S. Churchill

Words: Coffee or tea, that is the question.
Author: Internet

Words: Violence creates many problems, extreme violence solves all problems.
Author: Internet

Words: Life is long enought; greed is never stuffed.
Author: Internet

Words: I'll let you be in my dreams if I can be in yours
Author: Bob Dylan

Words: The more I live, the more I learn. The more I learn, the more I realize, the less I know.
Author: Michel Legrand

Words:
You've got to accentuate the positive
Eliminate the negative
Latch on to the affirmative
Don't mess with Mister In-Between
Author: Johnny Mercer

Words:
It go, right foot up, left foot slide
Left foot up, right foot slide
Author: Drake
